remarks: The absolute value of a finite product.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Dec-2017.)
statement:
fprodabs.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
fprodabs.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. Z ) $.
fprodabs.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) $.
fprodabs $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` prod_ k e. ( M ... N ) A ) = prod_ k e. ( M ... N ) ( abs ` A ) ) $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
